name: Sprint Car Challenge
summary: Sprint Car Racing is perhaps the most extreme, and most electrifying of all of the world`s motorsports. Compensating for their light weight and huge power, these beasts use enormous spoilers and wings to keep themselves on treacherous tracks. Drivers slide around corners sideways and spectacular collisions are frequent, as the cars jostle in tight packs. There is no other sport like it! And now, you can experience the frantic racing action for yourself.
